creator: Jugraj Singh
descriptionHtml:
►►About Hukamnama Sahib Application ►►
Hukamnama Sahib Application is designed and developed with aim to provide Daily Hukamnama Sahib and Live Kirtan Streaming on your mobile. This application is freely available on play store. Read the Daily Hukamnama from Sachkhand Sri Harimandir Sahib Amritsar in Gurmukhi, Punjabi, English and Hindi Language right within the application.
All updates of Daily Hukamnama Sahib are from www.hukamnamasahib.com.

►►Features►►

💥 New User interface
💥 New Mini Player
💥 More stable streaming

💥 HUKAMNAMA SAHIB
- View, download and share all hukamnamas of today or any past days.
- Live Audio Hukamnama Sahib
- Live Audio Hukamnama Sahib Katha

💥 LIVE KIRTAN
Many new live broadcast from many other Gurdrwara sahibs.

💥 AUDIO NITNEM
- Added audio nitnem of all banis

💥 GUTKA SAHIB
All Nitnem Banis added to read.

👉No Advertisements (No Ads)

👉 Daily Hukamnama Sahib Update Notification – You can get daily hukamnama sahib notification through app (Morning and Evening)

👉 Hukamnama Sahib in Different Languages – You can read hukamnama sahib with translation in different languages : Punjabi, Hindi and English.

👉 Sharing Feature – Various Buttons added in Hukamnama Sahib Tab to share Image of Hukamnama Sahib easily with one click through various social networking channels like Facebook, Whatsapp, Twitter, Instagram etc.

👉 Hukamnama Sahib Archive – Select any previous date to view hukamnama’s from the past.

👉 Live Kiran Radio – Listen Live Kirtan broadcast from Sri Darbar Sahib Amritsar 24 hours.

👉 Auto Play Live Kirtan – An option is provided in app settings tab to enable/disable auto play live kirtan.

👉 Mini Player in Notification Bar – Beautiful mini player is added in notification bar to easily play/pause , stop and share application.

👉 Beautiful Layout – The app is beautifully designed to meet the user’s expectations with simple and cool colors of the layout.

👉 Faster Loading – Within 5 Seconds Application starts playing live kirtan and load complete hukamnama sahib (Morning and Evening).

👉 Social Networking Site Links – To reach us through various social networking sites users must visit this tab.

👉 Feedback and Contact – Feedback and suggestions always welcome, contact us with one click through call, sms, email and whatsapp through tabs provided in applications.

►►Timing►►
Daily Hukamnama Sahib time changes (monthly) according to the Nanakshahi Calender months. We try our best to update Hukamnama Sahib as soon as possible but it takes some time to write and update on website so please cooperate with us.

►►Suggestions and Feedback►►
If you face and problem while using application or wand to share feedback, feel free to contact us at: http://hukamnamasahib.com/contact-us/
You may directly write us at info@hukamnamasahib.com ; info@jugrajsingh.com; gurpeetmundi777@gmail.com

►► www.hukamnamasahib.com ►►
This app is made available by support from individual donations by website users and S. Gurpreet Singh Mundi. We consider it as our moral responsibility to give due credit to all the content owners and thus, we gratefully acknowledge the support & contribution of SGPC for providing live streaming. HukamnamaSahib.com has helped connect the world-wide Sikh community and Guru Nanak Nam Leva Sangat through the Internet since 2017. We are a platform for human beings to hook up with wisdom of the Guru and with each other.

👏 For more information visit us on-line at http://hukamnamasahib.com
descriptionShort: Daily Hukamnama Sahib Updates & Live Kirtan from Shri Darbar Sahib Amritsar

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
💥 Fixed Sharing Issue
💥 Reduced App Size
💥 New Mini Player
💥 More stable streaming

💥 HUKAMNAMA SAHIB
- View, download and share all hukamnamas of today or any past days.
- Live Audio Hukamnama Sahib
- Live Audio Hukamnama Sahib Katha

💥 LIVE KIRTAN
Many new live broadcast from many other Gurdrwara sahibs.

💥 AUDIO NITNEM
- Added audio nitnem of all banis

💥 GUTKA SAHIB
All Nitnem Banis added to read.

For any feedback, queries and suggestions please write us:
jugrajsidhu@gmail.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Guru Roop Sangat Jio, We got some errors in Gurbani database that we got from the existing database on the internet. We apologize for any inconvenience. We are constantly trying to improve it. We are temporarily removing this section from the app. After carefully examining and correcting all the errors in the database, it will be reconnected. Thank you!

title: Hukamnama Sahib & Live Kirtan
